dashboardXml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Dashboard CurrencyCulture="tr-TR" RequestParameters="false">
  <Title Text="Dashboard" />
  <DataSources>
    <SqlDataSource Name="SQL Data Source 1" ComponentName="dashboardSqlDataSource1">
      <Connection Name="localhost_BobinTakipDB_Connection" ProviderKey="MSSqlServer">
        <Parameters>
          <Parameter Name="server" Value="GENIA\GENIA" />
          <Parameter Name="database" Value="BobinTakipDB" />
          <Parameter Name="useIntegratedSecurity" Value="True" />
          <Parameter Name="read only" Value="1" />
          <Parameter Name="generateConnectionHelper" Value="false" />
          <Parameter Name="SqlServerEncrypt" Value="false" />
          <Parameter Name="SqlServerTrustServerCertificate" Value="true" />
        </Parameters>
      </Connection>
      <Query Type="SelectQuery" Name="RingOkuma">
        <Tables>
          <Table Name="RingOkuma" X="30" Y="30" Width="125" Height="224" />
        </Tables>
        <Columns>
          <Column Table="RingOkuma" Name="ID" />
          <Column Table="RingOkuma" Name="Ring_No" />
          <Column Table="RingOkuma" Name="Kafa_No" />
          <Column Table="RingOkuma" Name="Dof_No" />
          <Column Table="RingOkuma" Name="Adres" />
          <Column Table="RingOkuma" Name="Epc" />
          <Column Table="RingOkuma" Name="Tari" />
          <Column Table="RingOkuma" Name="Is_Checked" />
        </Columns>
      </Query>
      <ResultSchema>
        <DataSet Name="SQL Data Source 1">
          <View Name="RingOkuma">
            <Field Name="ID" Type="Int64" />
            <Field Name="Ring_No" Type="Int32" />
            <Field Name="Kafa_No" Type="Int32" />
            <Field Name="Dof_No" Type="Int32" />
            <Field Name="Adres" Type="Byte" />
            <Field Name="Epc" Type="Int32" />
            <Field Name="Tari" Type="DateTime" />
            <Field Name="Is_Checked" Type="Boolean" />
          </View>
        </DataSet>
      </ResultSchema>
      <ConnectionOptions CloseConnection="true" />
    </SqlDataSource>
  </DataSources>
  <Items>
    <Chart ComponentName="chartDashboardItem1" Name="Chart 1">
      <Panes>
        <Pane Name="Pane 1" />
      </Panes>
    </Chart>
  </Items>
  <LayoutTree>
    <LayoutGroup>
      <LayoutItem DashboardItem="chartDashboardItem1" />
    </LayoutGroup>
  </LayoutTree>
</Dashboard>
